hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Man in Green's House#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #Zelda's Lullaby# and #a Huge Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #0# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #an Ocarina#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Deku Nut Capacity#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: Master, there is a 0 percent chance that this hint is useful in any way.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Talon's House#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #3# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Boomerang#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Boomerang#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: These hints can be quite useful. This is an exception.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Morpha#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #2# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Heart Container# and #the Mirror Shield#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.
